title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: R. Taibbi Age 11
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Textile with printed design of two large native american indian figures with headdresses and braids sitting in canoe on a river. On land behind them are four tipis and other human figures. In the water below them are fish and other sea creatures. Printed in blue, yellow, pink, (yellow over blue for green and pink over blue for purple) on muslin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1930s.
1930s. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave. Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky. 1976-98-30.
